text: Skazhi (o prorok!) Moim rabam, kotoryye uverovali, chtoby oni, srazhayas' s mnogobozhnikami, ubezhdali ikh sledovat' istinnoy vere ubeditel'nymi slovami, otkazavshis' ot slov, kotoryye privodyat k vrazhde i zlu. Ved' shaytan portit otnosheniya mezhdu veruyushchimi i neveruyushchimi. Shaytan dlya cheloveka - yavnyy vrag
